GSD.description:
pinctrl: aspeed: Fix potential NULL dereference in aspeed_pinmux_set_mux()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.132 by commit ef1e38532f4b2f0f3b460e938a2e7076c3bed5ee. For more details please see the references link.
